title: Hulsroy Bottle Cages Now Available Through Forager Cycles
content:
Hulsroy‘s made in Denmark stainless steel bottle cages ($49) have been notoriously hard to get ahold of in the States, usually costing as much to ship as the cages themselves. Well, if you’ve wanted to try one of these silver soldered stainless cages on your classic build, Forager Cycles now stocks them in the USA. Roll on over to Forager Cycles to read all about ’em!

The post Hulsroy Bottle Cages Now Available Through Forager Cycles appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
